1620240.name: Best Mall Simulator
1620240.description:
CHAT WITH US ON DISCORD






In the Best Mall Simulator, you’re going to play as a one-man renovating crew and a manager of the, soon to be best, Mall in the city.

Starting from different areas like food courts, playgrounds for kids to even toilets and a parking lot you’ll have to overcome all obstacles and bring the shine back to this place. Renovating and developing your Mall will be crucial for acquiring retailers, attracting customers, expanding your business, and earning more money!

Choose from a wide range of tools and options to customize your investment and keep customers from the competition! Don’t let your dreams be dreams, make them real and build a shopping empire of your own!

Key Features

Take matters in your hands

Bring back the glory to the once-great Shopping Center. Pick from a variety of tools and options to rebuild your mall and add some shine to your new business. Tear down the walls, rebuild the floors and add an extra touch of exclusivity to shine once more!
Maintain your venture and crush your competitors without a trace!

Expand your business

The bigger the mall, the more shops, and boutiques you can rent. The more sellers you have, the more people will visit your mall! That’s called making a profit$$$ Add more levels, additional zones, food courts and provide everything that customers can’t even imagine!
Expand your shopping empire and wipe competition from the shopping map. Keep customers
close and your enemies bankrupt - they won’t stand a chance!

Satisfy the customers and your pocket.

Attract customers and deliver the best shopping experience. Show the world who’s the most effective entrepreneur, renovator, and businessman! Plan your business and provide everything your customers will need. Remember, one upgrade a day keeps customers from the competition away! Make the best impression on them so they will spend more money in your shopping mall!

Keep the momentum
After you’re done with the renovation, you’ll have to think about income. And what’s better than pure cash? NOTHING! Adapt your business and feel the flow of the cash every time you open the doors of your Mall! Don’t stop there, use this money to balance your economy and develop your investment - for more cash!



Visit us on Discord ->
1620240.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 捷克语, 波兰语, 俄语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 匈牙利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
